content.title: Interview Summary
content.visibleText:
Interview Summary

Date: June 5, 2024

Interviewer: Jack Smith

Learning Objectives

- How can we improve goals to use the 'Messenger' Productivity tool?
- What new feature proposals can be made?

Making Challenges more Engaging

Game theory and 'Game' design are key topics that positively enrich the user's attention. Our annual Design Meets is one of the most creative and fun events.

content.title: Email from George Dita
content.visibleText:
From: George Dita <george.dita@trilogy.com>
Subject: Work with me to improve PostBeyond - give feedback on new AI features

Hi Team,

I am super proud to announce that we have successfully graduated from the AI Lab on PostBeyond and are now deploying a host of exciting new AI features that will take our platform to the next level. I am personally inviting you to join me in this journey and give feedback on these new features.

Best regards,
George Dita
